attributes.action: Have a national referendum on allowing parents to have 2 weeks family holidays
attributes.background: Give everyone the right to vote on whether they should have the rights to have an affordable family holiday when they choose, and in most cases when they can get the time off work. Allow families to have the right to choose and not be ditactated too by being threatened with fines.

rejection.details: If you want a referendum on term-time leave from school, we could accept a petition on that.
